attributes.description:
The Jimny can climb over most obstacles and steep hills without scraping its bumpers or underbody, thanks to an ample approach angle, ramp breakover angle, departure angle, as well as plenty of ground clearance. From the very first generation, the Jimny has always featured a rigid ladder frame chassis that offers a solid foundation for serious off-road performance. The new Jimny comes with a range of protective advances to keep you safe out in the wild or in the city.

Jimny 1.5 GL AllGrip Features:
Remote central locking with alarm system.
Front electric windows and electric mirrors.
Factory infotainment system with Bluetooth.
Multi function steering wheel.
Driver and passenger airbags.
Full Selective 4x4 with low range.
Automatic Gearbox.
Hill Descent Control.
Air conditioner.
15 Inch Alloy Wheels with High Profile Tyres

attributes.description: At Lexus East Rand, we learn from the past, build on the present and anticipate the future. While the obsession with perfection has not waned, the Lexus brand has advanced into something much bigger than just a motoring marque. Lexus has become a way of life. This is evident in the way that the brand has been sharing its passion for craftsmanship by partnering with world-renowned artists, supporting up-and-coming designers, and working to create amazing from film to fashion. It seems to make sense that the Lexus tagline will change from “The Pursuit of Perfection” to “Experience Amazing”. The need to experience amazing compels us as a corporate to engage in international discourse and meet the needs of those communities whose lives we are looking to enrich. This means going beyond the manufacturing of vehicles. So here at Lexus East Rand; we strive to give our customers exactly that, an Amazing Experience, from start to finish.

attributes.description:
The HAVAL H6 boasts an intelligent suite of safety features, so you can spend more time enjoying the journey. Cruise with confidence in every direction with Autonomous Emergency Braking, Adaptive Cruise Control, Lane-Keep Assist and Rear Cross-Traffic Alert.
Inspired by a fusion design of Asian and European influences, every design detail has been fine-tuned and crafted with a purpose and sense of sophisticated elegance.
From the power-adjustable, heated front seats beneath the spectacular panoramic sunroof, it's impossible to deny that the HAVAL H6 offers unparalleled comfort to both drivers and passengers.
